status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary:
Across the 6‑hour window the turbine remained in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals and produced very steady near‑rated power (power_mean≈0.9755 with extremely low variability), consistent with the high‑wind tag. Wind speed was generally strong and fairly stable on average (mean≈18.0, std≈1.0) but included at least one brief spike to 33.9.

Notable patterns/anomalies in the statistics include zero variability in rotor RPM (rotor_rpm_std=0.0) alongside some generator RPM variability (std≈0.61), a persistent positive yaw misalignment on average (~8.15), and a consistently negative power residual (mean≈‑0.107). Pitch and temperature were stable around 14.84 and 67.43, respectively.
